name: Security Plugin for Vault - Hide photos and videos
description: Security Plugin must be installed to prevent the Vault app from being terminated by task killer apps. Please install NQ Vault first (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.netqin.ps) before installing Security Plugin.   NQ Vault keeps your personal photos, videos , app lock, cloud backup Feel free to contact NQ customer service at vault@nq.com if you have any questions or concerns.
